name: Neko
description:
Neko is an endearing visual novel of love and companionship in the wake of tragedy. It is a story well versed in the season of winter and the theme of loneliness within the cold depths of everyday life.

The player navigates through a series of menu choices in order to avoid "bad end" routes and achieve the true ending based on the correct choices. The goal of the game is to navigate through the cat's dialogue until you reach the final end route.
